topic.title: ADVISED OF HEALTH IMPLICATIONS INDICATOR
topic.shortdesc: For the Female Genital Mutilation Data Set, ADVISED OF HEALTH IMPLICATIONS INDICATOR is an indication of whether the PATIENT has been provided with information and advice where the INFORMATION AND ADVICE TYPE PROVIDED FOR FEMALE GENITAL MUTILATION is National Code 'Advised of the health implications of female genital mutilation', during a CARE CONTACT for female genital mutilation.
